0.name: {~00AAFF}Third Upgrade Mod Changelog 3.2.2}
0.text:
[!] Fixed a bug that allowed the 8th dwelling to be built for the third and fourth time.

A solution to the problem that allows armies to be recruited indefinitely is still being sought. If you want to help with a save or detail how to reproduce the error, please do so at Discord Channel of the Mod.

1.name: {~FFE400}Wog options disabled for TUM}
1.text:
The following Wog Options are disabled by default in TUM due to incompatibilities:

[-]Rebalanced Creatures
[-]Enhanced Monsters
[-]Upg level 7 become level 8
[-]Extended Upgrades
[-]Universal Upgrades
[-]Rampart Farie Dragon
[-]Buckler of Beelzebub
[-]Enhanced Creature
[-]Adittional Uprades
[-]Combo artifacts from Enhanced Artifacts II
[-]Monster Specialities from Hero Specialization Boosts.
